attributes.action: Subsidise Public Transport and regulate the prices the Bus companies can charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that public transport should be subsidised for 3 reasons,
1)It is no long cost effective with private companies charging extortionate fares
2)It is better for congestion and the Environment and is more useful than flying. 
3)Not everyone can afford a Car but, soon people will be priced out of going on the Bus as well so then what will they do?
